name: family-hub-performance-tests
description: k6 performance tests for Family Hub GraphQL API

scripts.seed:dataloader:ci: PGPASSWORD=$POSTGRES_PASSWORD psql -h localhost -U postgres -d familyhub -f seed/dataloader-test-data.sql
scripts.test:all: npm run test:baseline && npm run test:dataloader && npm run test:load

author: Family Hub Team
